__notes: Don't touch strings and numbers in curly braces ({}), they are used for formatting

boot.dev_build: - DEVELOPMENT BUILD // BUGS MAY BE COMMON -

settings.corr1: Seems like your settings file is corrupted!
settings.corr_regen: Press Enter to regenerate your settings file and quit the game.

game.do_you_want_to_have: Do you want to have this in your progressbar:
game.press_to_catch: C or Y to catch, any other key to shy away:

bsod.bsod2: The current game session will be terminated
bsod.bsod3: * Press Enter to terminate the current session
